projectsData.projectTitle: Modern, family-friendly updates to an Eichler home
projectsData.projectDescription: An Eichler in San Rafaelâ€™s Terra Linda neighborhood went through full bathroom transformations that included fresh modern updates, while maintaining the classic Eichler feel. Original wood paneling and mirrored cabinet were kept and reconditioned to maintain the original beauty of mid-century modern style.
A mid-century modern refresh of a previously renovated East Bay Eichler Home includes infusion of a playful color palette and sustainable design materials.
A well-loved and cared for Original Eichler home receives a mid-century inspired renovation and vintage furnishings for a young, active family.
